Topic.Title: Would there be a way to host a game on Tumblr or Carrd?

Posts.EditableText: Kind of a silly concept I know, I'm just curious ! I've been looking at the tutorial on how to host it on a site but honestly the tutorial seems a bit clunky to me so. (I'll probably try and make it work for an app but yk im just curious, i prefer pc gaming so!)
